title: Weekly Digest (16 February, 2020 - 23 February, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 15 issues were created.
Of these, 2 issues have been closed and 13 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10065 [Popup error reappears if tap on "Cancel" in "Error connecting to mailserver" popup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10065), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10064 [incorrect prices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10064), by [GregTheGreek](https://github.com/GregTheGreek)
:green_heart: #10063 [ Fix failed e2e ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10063), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10062 [Message cut off when selecting account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10062), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10061 [Biometric auth is not saved after enabling from profile ("Save password" is not enabled)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10061), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10060 [Wrong ERC20 decimal rounding](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10060), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #10059 [cleanup of shell scripts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10059), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #10058 [Wrong domain name is shown if .eth name is connected](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10058), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10057 [Unable to delete group chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10057), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10056 [Add mark all read](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10056), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #10055 [Do not use naked-address when hashing messages prior to Keycard signing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10055), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #10054 [Can't get messages and invitation to group chat (Mainnet)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10054), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #10052 [Too hard to find and share chat key](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10052), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10053 [Increase height of recovery word text input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10053), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:heart: #10051 [drop eth.beta fleet, it's been decommissioned](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10051), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #10051 [drop eth.beta fleet, it's been decommissioned](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10051), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
It received 6 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 20 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 14 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #10063 [ Fix failed e2e ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10063), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:yellow_heart: #10059 [cleanup of shell scripts](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10059), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #10056 [Add mark all read](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10056), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #10055 [Do not use naked-address when hashing messages prior to Keycard signing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10055), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #10015 [WIP Add keycard pairing animation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10015), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9993 [[#9789] Add a loading indicator and button to username input of start…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9993), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9971 [[#9886] App shows 'buy' for stickerpack user owns when pressing on st…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9971), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9970 [disable biometric auth when device can't save password (rooted)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9970), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #9945 [WIP Rework and update react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9945), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9915 [Make bottom sheet height dynamical](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9915), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9898 [add watch only address using qrcode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9898), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9882 [Fix failed faceid clears auth settings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9882), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9788 [[#9748] eip681 parsing uri with whitespaces](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9788), by [ghmulti](https://github.com/ghmulti)
:yellow_heart: #9390 [Add web3.keycard.signTypedData](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9390), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 6 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10053 [Increase height of recovery word text input](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10053), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:purple_heart: #10051 [drop eth.beta fleet, it's been decommissioned](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10051), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #9949 [Add ENV option to enable waku-mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9949), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9941 [improvement on snackbar by considering login time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9941), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:purple_heart: #9917 [componentizied input-search and search in set currency and token management](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9917), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:purple_heart: #9868 [Move chat dialogs to bottom sheet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9868), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 7 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [componentizied input-search and added in curency and token  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/81c4d16f9ff40df2853e329544365b1e9c2faaf0) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add bottom sheet to chat top bar options  Add bottom sheet to message long press  Make whole bottom sheet panel dragable  Fixes ￼#9846  Use spring animation for bottom size of bottom sheet  Remove extra border height from bottom sheet  The height is already added to content height  Remove extra set value for animation  Timing and spring already mutates the animation value  Reuse chat bottom sheet in chat list  Update the size of new chat bottom sheet  Add remove to group chat  add chat id for clear history to be reused outside of current chat  Fix public chat bottom sheet missing destructoring  Replace icon for chat fetch history  Could be rotated arrow up, but this requires special handling in icons or list item  Fix remove public chat event  Dismiss keyboard on sheet mount  iOs rename arrow down icon  Fix unusable screen after close of bottom shet  The callback is called after 1.5 seconds after the animation starts. This happens because spring animation takes more time on animating post animation oscillations.  Add accessibility labels  Fix bad message destructoring  add view profile on long message press  Reset bottom value after animation  Remove pending circle from avatar in chat sheets  Do not show open profile on own messages  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/40c12241e0ed23c66c28d23877c38fedd11f5eab) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e-tests: update GitHub token used  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8ffbf61b7986c846df67a48233fdeccf47599ad7) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [drop eth.beta fleet, it's been decommissioned  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7ff412722dfcee4f1db0a34663ada5dbe36f89e1) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Increase height of recovery word text input  Fixes #9658  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/505ef626ccdeb1a54955b882c502a99ae2c920a0) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add option to enable waku-mode  This commit adds an option to enable waku mode through ENV settings.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a2af83f0340abe89e6437479fc1eedf95a597ade) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [improvement on snackbar by considering login time  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/705b80ef8f7b48080dd21f0cc940f258effe5b36) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)

 - - -

You all are the stars! :star2:

 - - - 
# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:

*You can also [view all Weekly Digests by clicking here](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues?q=is:open+is:issue+label:weekly-digest).*
